name: chorus-file-tools
description: Sandboxed file operations for Chorus agents

scripts.build: gren make Main --output=build/file-tools-tmp && tail -n +2 build/file-tools-tmp > build/file-tools.js && bun build --compile build/file-tools.js --outfile build/file-tools && rm build/file-tools-tmp
scripts.test:integration: npm run build && npm run build:runner && ../integration-runner/build/runner tests/integration build/file-tools
